channel.title: Is there anyway?
channel.description:
Hi guys. I wanted to know if there is any way i could put a runescape app on my website or atleast make a mopar app go to the runescape server?
Please tell me if i have posted in the wrong area, Thanks
ikick221

item.title: Is there anyway?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

god i thought you were going to ask about private servers then!

but yes it is possible, look at some of the loaders out there, and instead of extending Frame, extend Applet, and have an init() method, make that the same as the main method and it should work

its very early in morning so sorry for my noob speak

Read full topic
